Customer service is provided for all Phantom Fireworks
Â®
Â products and purchases made at Phantom showrooms.Â  Please call the customer service desk Monday through Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. EST/EDT at 1-800-777-1699.Â  Hours are extended during the fireworks season.Â If no one is there to service your call, please leave your name, number and the date and time of your call and a customer service representative will get back to you as soon as possible.Â  When you talk to your customer service representative, please ask for his or her name to expedite any follow-up relative to your issue.

From Sparks to Spectacular, Discover the Best in Fireworks
About Us
A Legacy of Inspiring Celebrations and Igniting Skies for over 40 years
Phantom Fireworks, America's Leading Fireworks Retailer for Over Four Decades
Phantom Fireworks is America's #1 Fireworks Retailer, Lighting Up Backyards of America for over 40 years. With a rich history and unparalleled expertise in the industry, we are proud to be the best destination for all your fireworks needs, delivering a thrilling and safe experience like no other.
Phantom Fireworks has earned its esteemed reputation through a steadfast commitment to excellence in both product quality and safety. Now with over 80 showrooms in 15 states open all year round, and nearly 2,000 temporary locations in 17 states, Phantom Fireworks has become America's Premier Fireworks destination.
We are dedicated to providing the highest quality consumer fireworks that bring joy and excitement to celebrations across America. We are committed to offering exceptional value, ensuring safety, and delivering an unforgettable experience for our customers.
Ownership:
President (Owner):
Bruce J. Zoldan
Vice President: Alex Zoldan
Vice President:
Ron Zoldan
How It All Started
Phantom Fireworks, the unrivaled leader in the consumer fireworks industry, owes its origins to the entrepreneurial spirit of Bruce J. Zoldan. More than 40 years ago, Bruce embarked on a remarkable journey that would transform the fireworks landscape. At the time, he worked as a salesman of non-food rack merchandise to grocery and convenience stores. However, it was his keen sense of opportunity and customer demand that propelled him to venture into a new realm: fireworks.
In the early 1970s, Bruce listened attentively to his customers' desires and recognized the untapped potential in the world of pyrotechnics. Responding to their requests, he began selling a line of sparklers, igniting the spark that would eventually evolve into the renowned Phantom Fireworks we know today. Through Bruce's unwavering dedication, entrepreneurial vision, and commitment to customer satisfaction, Phantom Fireworks has ascended to become America's foremost consumer-based fireworks retailer.
Driven by the unwavering passion of Bruce J. Zoldan, Phantom Fireworks has experienced exponential growth, expanding its footprint across the nation. With retail stores and 80 showrooms in 15 states, over 1,500 temporary sales venues in 17 states, and a thriving primary warehouse and corporate office in Youngstown, Ohio, the company's presence continues to soar. Furthermore, Phantom Fireworks proudly supplies 4th of July products to numerous national retail chains in 47 states, catering to the demand for consumer fireworks. As testament to its unrivaled quality and appeal, Phantom's wholesale fireworks division is also experiencing rapid growth.
Bruce J. Zoldan's indomitable spirit and relentless pursuit of excellence have firmly established Phantom Fireworks as the industry leader, trusted for its unrivaled selection, exceptional service, and commitment to safety. From humble beginnings to a nationwide phenomenon, Bruce's legacy lives on through Phantom Fireworks' dedication to delivering unforgettable experiences and igniting the magic of celebrations for people across the country.
Variety of Brands
For over 40 years, Phantom FireworksÂ® has established itself as the leading consumer fireworks company, synonymous with exceptional quality, value, and safety. With the widest selection of fireworks, novelties, and celebration items, we bring unrivaled excitement to holidays, weddings, birthdays, and special events. From the breathtaking 500 Gram Aerial Repeaters, Mortar kits, and Finales to the enchanting Fountains, Rockets, and Sparklers, our diverse range caters to every occasion. Discover our exclusive private label products, including Wolfpack, Silver Salute, and the renowned Grucci collection from Bellport, NY, representing the pinnacle of fireworks craftsmanship.
Safety and Quality Control
At Phantom Fireworks, safety is our utmost priority. We go above and beyond to ensure the sale and manufacture of safe and compliant fireworks. Our dedicated team of buyers regularly travels to China to collaborate with factories, ensuring the development of new products and enhancing existing lines while maintaining stringent quality control measures. As a founding member of the American Fireworks Standards Laboratory, we subject our products to rigorous testing at the factory level in China and maintain an additional product testing program at our receiving warehouse. This comprehensive approach guarantees that our merchandise not only meets but exceeds all requirements set by the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission.
We take great pride in providing our customers with a secure and enjoyable experience. From our commitment to quality control to our active participation in fireworks safety initiatives, we strive to deliver unparalleled peace of mind.
At Phantom Fireworks, we understand the significance of responsible fireworks usage. That's why we make every effort to ensure our customers have access to educational resources. Visit our fireworks university to learn more about fireworks safety and discover valuable insights on using our products carefully and responsibly. Trust in Phantom Fireworks to safeguard your celebrations, whether it's for the 4th of July or any other special occasion.
Legislation and Education
Phantom Fireworks is at the forefront of promoting safety and advancing legislation in the fireworks industry. Our commitment to safety extends beyond our products and into the legislative and safety realms. We actively engage in our own legislative program, collaborating with industry organizations such as the American Pyrotechnic Association, Pyrotechnics Guild International, American Fireworks Standards Laboratory, National Fire Protection Association, and various state and local fireworks organizations. Through our membership and participation, we contribute to the development of safety guidelines and regulations that protect both consumers and the industry.
As leaders in the field, Phantom Fireworks takes pride in our dedication to safety and education. We understand the importance of staying informed and involved in the latest industry practices and standards. By actively participating in these organizations, we ensure that our customers benefit from the most up-to-date safety measures and advancements in the field.
Trust Phantom Fireworks to lead the way in safety and education, providing you with the highest quality products and promoting responsible fireworks enjoyment for all.
